nvidia-texture-tools r1380 (January 30, 2014)
- License: "MIT license"
- Online: http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/
- Use the SVN patch "enabled_tiff_support.patch" to enable tiff support
- Use the SVN patch "nvtt_surface_stream_load.patch" to extend the surface loading interface to allow loading from streams
